name: Pocket Watcher Bot
description: What is the project about? Pocket Watcher, your all-in-one solution designed to make you a more profitable cryptocurrency trader. With features like tracking fresh wallet activities, in-depth coin analysis, and pinpointing top profiteer wallets in gem coins, Pocket Watcher is set to revolutionize your trading experience. What makes your project unique? Making easy to check infos about new contracts such as what fresh wallets are buying, whats the next wave. History of your project. By traders, for traders, always trying to help our holders. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We want to create $POCKET DAO, so users can vote on new features. What can your token be used for? It can be use for finding what new wallets are buying, check if snipers sold, or buying more and many other functions.
